package.name: readjust
package.install:
mv -v /tools/bin/{ld,ld-old} mv -v /tools/$(uname -m)-pc-linux-gnu/bin/{ld,ld-old} mv -v /tools/bin/{ld-new,ld} ln -sv /tools/bin/ld /tools/$(uname -m)-pc-linux-gnu/bin/ld
gcc -dumpspecs | sed -e 's@/tools@@g' \ -e '/\*startfile_prefix_spec:/{n;s@.*@/usr/lib/ @}' \ -e '/\*cpp:/{n;s@$@ -isystem /usr/include@}' > \ `dirname $(gcc --print-libgcc-file-name)`/specs
echo '-=> compiling and checking dummy' echo 'main(){}' > dummy.c cc dummy.c -v -Wl,--verbose &> dummy.log readelf -l a.out | grep ': /lib' echo '-=> grepping through dummy.log' grep -o '/usr/lib.*/crt[1in].*succeeded' dummy.log echo '-=> grepping headers in dummy.log' grep -B1 '^ /usr/include' dummy.log echo '-=> grepping linker in dummy.log' grep 'SEARCH.*/usr/lib' dummy.log |sed 's|; |\n|g' echo '-=> grepping libc in dummy.log' grep "/lib.*/libc.so.6 " dummy.log echo '-=> grepping ld in dummy.log' grep found dummy.log
touch /etc/readjust-successful
